annotate_step.explanation: Label some objects to let your model train to find them. More labeled objects give you better accuracy.
annotate_step.loading: Processing uploaded images. Please wait a few minutes...
annotate_step.title: Annotate images

create_step.classes_helper_1: Enter the name of a class and press the
create_step.classes_helper_2: key. You can enter several classes in this way.
create_step.error_msg_cattle: Cattle must have these fields: red, black.
create_step.error_msg_classes: Please add at least one object class.
create_step.error_msg_duplicate: Model already exists, please enter another name.
create_step.error_msg_internal: An error has ocurred. Please retry.
create_step.error_msg_pools: Pools must have this field: pool
create_step.error_msg_wrong_classes: For the chosen use case you must enter exactly these classes:
create_step.explanation: Choose a name and labels to setup your model.
create_step.name_helper: Enter a name for your model.
create_step.title: Create new model

predict_step.explanation: At this time their images are being analyzed. This process may take a few hours. We will notify you by mail when it is ready to see the results.
predict_step.title: Predict model

select_step.dropzone: Drag and drop your images here, or click.
select_step.explanation: Select pre-existing images or upload new ones and then click Predict
select_step.title: Select images

train_step.explanation: This a demo, please press the continue button
train_step.finished_explanation: The training process is over. Click continue to make a prediction
train_step.title: Train model

upload_step.dropzone: Drag and drop your images here, or click.
upload_step.explanation: Select one or more images and then click upload.
upload_step.title: Choose or upload images
